review: Very calm and composed. Diagnosis is good  She give time to patient and family. More patients centric.
*** ** *** **** ******** she explains everything with so much of patience. Spend 20mins on every visit and check everything keenly.

Recently I've visited this clinic for a gynaec problem. It's a new clinic in this area, with a little doubt in my mind whether the doctors are well experienced or not. But Dr.Swapna Mudragada heard my problem and clearly explained what it is and treated me with the appropriate medication.  I'm extremely happy and complacent with the treatment. I would recommend everyone to this clinic.

Based on my personal experience, I had many complications in my pregnancy. I was referred to Swapna madam from other hospital. Swapna madam has taken special care about the pregnancy, very friendly and she was always reachable on phone and quick in responding. She explains the issue very well and madam is very patient and clear all our queries without hesitation even if you ask multiple times. We are blessed with a baby girl and it's c section. Within one week i got relieved from stiches pains and felt normal because of her not only caring and also lovable mental support. Really i felt that nothing bad will happened to me and to my baby because i am the swapna mam candidate. So, Truly recommend Swapna madam for any gyenic issues or pregnancy consultation and delivery related. Thank you so much madam.
Dr was very friendly , patient listener and very responsive , and very good at encouraging . Supportive
Doctor listen to the patient and understand the issues well and advise accordingly. No unnecessary test recommending. **** ** * *** **** **** *****
****** ** ********** She was very friendly and comfortable! She was very thorough in diagnosis of my issue! Highly recommend

Visited her for some issue. It was on time. She spent time to explain the issue and what could cause it. Suggested good changes in diet and habits. No additional tests etc. Pretty comfortable while talking.thanks.
